section.title: API Endpoint
section.paragraph: Cinder has a system for managing multiple APIs on different subdomains. Currently there is support for the OpenStack API.

desc_content.paragraph: Test fault serialized to JSON via file-extension and/or header.
Test fault serialized to JSON via file-extension and/or header.
Ensure the status_int is set correctly on faults.
